医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球寻求饮食中钠和钾的适当平衡全面审查将全球膳食钠和钾指南与日本的膳食指南进行了对比，强调需要根据文化定制膳食建议，以有效对抗非传染性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/The-global-quest-for-the-right-balance-of-sodium-and-potassium-in-the-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/The-global-quest-for-the-right-balance-of-sodium-and-potassium-in-the-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4e55f81-ef24-4128-acc3-cb6fb3b1e29c Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:59:00 -0400 The global quest for the right balance of sodium and potassium in the diet
Bio-Techne 引用 RNAscope 技术的同行评审出版物超过 10,000 篇Bio-Techne Corporation 今天宣布，Bio-Techne 空间生物学部门旗下的 Advanced Cell Diagnostics (ACD) 已发表超过 10,000 篇引用 RNAscope™ ISH 技术使用和应用的同行评审出版物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Bio-Techne-surpasses-10000-peer-reviewed-publications-citing-RNAscope-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Bio-Techne-surpasses-10000-peer-reviewed-publications-citing-RNAscope-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=250b27e2-98ad-4fe1-8542-be9eccdd6cbf Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:53:00 -0400 Bio-Techne surpasses 10,000 peer-reviewed publications citing RNAscope technology
母亲糖尿病与儿童多动症风险略有增加有关大规模研究表明，母亲患有糖尿病与后代患 ADHD 的风险略有增加有关，这凸显了神经发育障碍中遗传和环境因素复杂的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Maternal-diabetes-linked-to-a-slight-increase-in-ADHD-risk-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Maternal-diabetes-linked-to-a-slight-increase-in-ADHD-risk-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=df50f1b3-c74b-4f31-802b-14ba4a03fc90 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:31:00 -0400 Maternal diabetes linked to a slight increase in ADHD risk in children
母亲对预防食物过敏的影响：仔细研究饮食和环境该综述评估了怀孕期间母亲的饮食和环境因素如何影响后代食物过敏的预防，强调均衡饮食的重要性，并对避免过敏原的有效性提出质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Maternal-influences-on-food-allergy-prevention-A-closer-look-at-diet-and-environment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Maternal-influences-on-food-allergy-prevention-A-closer-look-at-diet-and-environment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8250cf7c-88e7-4253-bb95-b1c3b5b02e86 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:14:00 -0400 Maternal influences on food allergy prevention: A closer look at diet and environment
创新的 VR 课程解决学生的心理健康挑战伦敦大学圣乔治学院领导了一项革命性的工作，通过使用虚拟现实 (VR) 课程来减轻压力和焦虑，从而改善学生的心理健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Innovative-VR-sessions-tackle-mental-health-challenges-in-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Innovative-VR-sessions-tackle-mental-health-challenges-in-students.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf314c25-ea91-4367-9697-e71da3e0d5c8 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 23:03:00 -0400 Innovative VR sessions tackle mental health challenges in students
血液蛋白可能是儿童脑震荡恢复延迟的潜在生物标志物研究人员发现了一种血液蛋白，可以帮助检测哪些儿童在受伤后两周以上会出现持续的脑震荡症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Blood- Protein-could-be-a-pottial-biomarker-for-delayed-concussion-recovery-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Blood- Protein-could-be-a-pottial-biomarker-for-delayed-concussion-recovery-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6f6f56a-9f83-4275-b877-28bfec882b39 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 22:53:24 -0400 Blood protein could be a potential biomarker for delayed concussion recovery in children
研究揭示炎症在新冠病毒长期挥之不去的影响中的作用大规模研究发现，长期新冠患者表现出与不同症状相关的持续炎症和特异性免疫反应，凸显了个性化治疗方法的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Study-reveals-inflammations-role-in-long-COVIDs-lingering-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Study-reveals-inflammations-role-in-long-COVIDs-lingering-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cec3f8f6-df78-49f9-924f-3db01de05017 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 22:51:00 -0400 Study reveals inflammation's role in long COVID's lingering effects
研究人员发现了解原发性膜性肾病进展的新线索目前尚无疗法可以阻止儿童慢性肾病的进展或恢复肾细胞过滤血液的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Researchers-find-new-clues-to-understanding-the-progression-of-primary-membranous-nephropathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Researchers-find-new-clues-to-understanding-the-progression-of-primary-membranous-nephropathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e932530-1d28-405d-9a26-2163958b6209 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 22:40:42 -0400 Researchers find new clues to understanding the progression of primary membranous nephropathy
触摸的治愈力量：研究发现对各个年龄段的健康都有一定的好处荟萃分析显示，触摸疗法对不同人群的心理和身体健康都有一定的有益影响，触摸干预对于缓解疼痛、焦虑和抑郁以及促进新生儿健康结果尤其有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/The-healing-power-of-touch-Study-finds-moderate-health-benefits-across-ages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/The-healing-power-of-touch-Study-finds-moderate-health-benefits-across-ages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef611246-4426-4a75-a46d-2b419847c3f3 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 22:39:00 -0400 The healing power of touch: Study finds moderate health benefits across ages
研究发现甲状腺功能减退症患者 D 型人格的患病率很高发表在《临床内分泌与代谢杂志》上的新研究发现，甲状腺功能减退症患者中 D 型人格的患病率很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Study-finds-high-prevalence-of-type-D-personality-among-people-with-hypotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240409/Study-finds-high-prevalence-of-type-D-personality-among-people-with-hyposteroidism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2e39f7c-6708-433b-8e10-7e6b7f393ab2 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 22:35:20 -0400 Study finds high prevalence of type D personality among people with hypothyroidism
